attributes.action: Ban the rise in price on family holidays during school & public holidays
attributes.additional_details:
Man loses Supreme Court battle about term-time holidays

https://www.2br.co.uk/news/local-news/2262935/breaking-man-loses-supreme-court-battle-about-term-time-holidays/
attributes.background: Schools are taking people to court and fining them who take their children out of school to take them on holiday during term times. People are doing this as the price of a holiday during school holidays are dramatically increased and some people cannot afford to go any other time
